task.name: v.segment
task.description: Creates points/segments from input vector lines and positions.
task.keywords: vector, geometry, node, point, segment, vertex

parameter.name: input
parameter.label: Name of input vector lines map
parameter.description: Or data source for direct OGR access

parameter.name: layer
parameter.label: Layer number or name
parameter.description: Vector features can have category values in different layers. This number determines which layer to use. When used with direct OGR access this is the layer name.

parameter.name: rules
parameter.label: Name of file containing segment rules

flag.name: overwrite
flag.description: Allow output files to overwrite existing files
